version_description:
Feature:

- New indicator to show if a channel is muted
- Show indicator if a channels are linked
- Muting a linked channel mutes also the other linked channel
- Changing volume of linked channel changes the volume of the other linked channel too

Bug:
- An an aux bus channel could not be muted

Features:
- Added support for the Behringer X18
- Added support for the Soundcraft UI 16 (This is brand new, feel free to contact me if something is wrong!)

Bugs:
- Custom view didn't react correct when trying to move faders

Bugfix:
- Fixes a problem that the controls disappears when you lay your device down

Feature:
- Adds the possibility to switch between multiple consoles
